title: Trump Doubles Down on N. Korea Threats While Aides Praise Him: A Closer Look | Sen. Tammy Duckworth
description:
Seth takes a closer look at how Donald Trump is handling tensions surrounding North Korea's nuclear weapons program and the aides he's relying on to boost his ego during this tense exchange.
Then, Senator Tammy Duckworth breaks down why President Trump should stop trying to "out-crazy" Kim Jong-un and how his transgender military ban is "foolish at best."
After her interview with Seth, Sen. Duckworth spoke with Late Night producer Henry Melcher for a podcast exclusive segment backstage at Studio 8G.
